name: Detective Duck
description:
Come play the arcade game that critics are calling more addictive than quack.

In the corrupt city of Duckville, there's one detective with an uncompromising sense of justice and nerves of steel willing to stand up to the growing wave of crime that threatens the once-proud town.

Features an arcade mode with 4 unique weapons and 5 different enemy types. Stay tuned for the full story mode. All music credit goes to Haircuts for Men; please enjoy the greatest barber beats available on the web.
